price: Ndio hivi! Na hakika wenye kuasi bila ya shaka watapata marudio maovu kabisa;
footnotes: Neema hizi ni malipo ya wachamngu. Na hakika majabari wenye kuwaasi Manabii wao bila ya shaka watakuwa na marejeo na mwisho muovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
